page.title: 17TODD FAMILIES DAY
page.content: 7.15am Everybody in the Todd family gets up for work or school. 7.30am They have breakfast of toast, tea and cereal. 7.45am Dr. Todd sets of in his car for morning surgery in Barrow. 8.30am Dr. Todd starts work and the Todd children get driven to school by Mrs. Todd. 8.50am The three Todd children start school. Matthew who is 16 and Sara who is 14 go to Parkview. Kate who is 11 goes to Roose. 9.00am Mrs. Todd goes shopping in Barrow-in-Furness. 11.00am Mrs. Todd gets home from town and begins the housework. 12.00am The Todd family have lunch. Dr. Todd, Sara and Matthew have lunch at surgery. Mrs Todd has lunch at home and Kate has packed lunch in her
